name: Kepler Huaynate Gamarra
title: Civil Engineer | Structural • Geotechnical • Infrastructure
profile: Civil Engineer with experience in structural analysis and design, applied geotechnical engineering, and transportation infrastructure projects. Strong technical approach and international orientation.
structural: Design and analysis of reinforced concrete buildings, seismic analysis, drift control, and technical documentation.
geotechnical: Interpretation of soil investigation reports and foundation design criteria.
transportation: Urban and road infrastructure projects with multidisciplinary coordination.
programming: Use of Python to support engineering calculations, verification, and technical workflows.
